name: MARVEL ULTIMATE ALLIANCE 3: The Black Order – Rise of the Phoenix
name_original: MARVEL ULTIMATE ALLIANCE 3: The Black Order – Rise of the Phoenix
description: Four more X-Men join the alliance—Phoenix, Gambit, Ice Man, and Cable— as part of the second of 3 DLC packs included with the MARVEL ULTIMATE ALLIANCE 3: The Black Order Expansion Pass. This pack includes these four playable characters, the newly added Danger Room Mode, and additional Gauntlet missions.
